alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northeastern Brooks Range; Northern Arctic Coast; Northwestern Brooks Range; Western Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 12 at 11:04AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Wind Chill near 60 Below... Wind Chill will hover in the 40 to 60 below range through the weekend. Cold temperatures continue across the Arctic with lows in the 30s to 40s below, while highs will be in the 20s and 30s below. Wind will generally be less than 10 mph through Sunday, except on the Eastern Arctic Coast where they will pick up to around 15 mph. Residents should use caution if they are outside and ensure that they are protected from the cold as frostbite can occur with less than 10 minutes of exposure.

area.areaDesc: Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northeastern Brooks Range; Northern Arctic Coast; Northwestern Brooks Range; Western Arctic Coast
